meta.name: Automate Manufacturing QC Documentation & Compliance with Jotform

parameters.jsCode:
// Generate HTML certificate of compliance const data = $input.item.json; const html = `

CERTIFICATE OF COMPLIANCE

ISO 9001:2015 Quality Management System

Certificate No: ${data.id}

Date: ${new Date(data.timestamp).toLocaleDateString()}

Product: ${data.product_name}

Batch Number: ${data.batch_number}

Inspector: ${data.inspector_name}

Inspection Results

Parameter Measured Value Specification Status
Length (mm) ${data.measurements.dimension_length} 100-102 ${data.measurements.dimension_length >= 100 && data.measurements.dimension_length <= 102 ? '‚úì' : '‚úó'}
Width (mm) ${data.measurements.dimension_width} 50-52 ${data.measurements.dimension_width >= 50 && data.measurements.dimension_width <= 52 ? '‚úì' : '‚úó'}
Weight (g) ${data.measurements.weight} 450-550 ${data.measurements.weight >= 450 && data.measurements.weight <= 550 ? '‚úì' : '‚úó'}

Compliance Status: ${data.compliance_status}

_______________________

Quality Manager Signature

This certificate is electronically generated and valid without signature

`; return { html: html, filename: `Certificate_${data.batch_number}_${data.id}.html` };

parameters.content:
## üì• INPUT SOURCES

**Two ways to receive data:**
- Form submissions
- Scheduled checks

## üîÑ PROCESSING

Calculates compliance
based on specs

## üíæ STORAGE

Saves to Drive & tracking sheet

## üö® ALERTS

Notifies team
for failures only

## üìä DAILY REPORTS

Runs at 8 AM
Summarizes metrics

## üì• MANUAL FORM

Jotform Trigger

Create your form for free on [Jotform using this link](https://www.jotform.com/?partner=mediajade)
